name: Jewel Pet: Mahou No Oheyade Issho Ni Asobou!
name_original: Jewel Pet: Mahou No Oheyade Issho Ni Asobou!
description:
Jewel Pet: Mahou No Oheyade Issho Ni Asobou! is a casual simulation game developed by MTO. It was originally released in 2010.
Jewel Pet: Mahou No Oheyade Issho Ni Asobou! is available on Nintendo DS.
